awd_titl_txt: An Integrated Design, Fabrication, and RF Testing Laboratory
awd_abstract_narration: This project exposes undergraduate students to a laboratory                environment where the design, fabrication, and testing of circuits and          systems for RF and microwave applications are linked together.                                                                                                       Students using the laboratory incorporate laboratory experiences           into their design process, they gain a realistic view of the value and          limitations of analytic models and the methods used to develop the              models, they become familiar with industry practices and standards, and         they experience the limitations of instruments and measurement                  techniques.                                                                                                                                                          This award is being matched by an equal sum from the grantee.
